meanings.def: having the colour of blue and red mixed together
examples: His face was purple with rage.
The effort was making her face turn purple.
It produces lovely dark purple berries around this time of year.

meanings.def: writing or a piece of writing that is too grand in style
the colour of blue and red mixed together
examples: Her hair was dyed a bright shade of purple.
Her eyes were a deep purple.
the startling pinks and purples of the dresses
